message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save money, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $9200 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're looking to save more, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to give me a discount, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to give you a slight adjustment, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10200. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I'm still not comfortable with the price, Alice. I'm willing to pay $8800 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to give you a slight adjustment, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
